items.title: New flu strain is circulating - so should you buy a vaccine this year?
items.description: Flu has come early and experts predict it could be a particularly nasty season, with a new strain circulating.

items.title: Minimum wage should not go any higher, suggests Badenoch
items.description: Badenoch claimed Labour had tipped the balance too far against workers and in favour of welfare.

items.title: Much of Â£11bn Covid scheme fraud 'beyond recovery', report finds
items.description: The response to the pandemic led to "enormous outlays of public money which exposed it to the risk of fraud and error", a report says.

items.title: TV faithful Claudia Winkleman made MBE by King at Windsor Castle
items.description: The Traitors and Strictly presenter was recognised on Tuesday for services to broadcasting.

items.title: Trump criticises 'weak' European leaders over Ukraine and immigration
items.description: In his latest public criticism of Europe, the US president claims countries are "decaying".
